pages.text: The Afterlight is a mysterious dimension, that was inhabited by lunar folks.$(br)More information has the Afterlight Tome.

pages.title: The Afterlight Tome
pages.text: Craft this tome, to find out more about the Afterlight.
Now to make some strange obsidian.$(br2)Consult your tome on how to do this.
Activate with the Staff of Moonlight
With some strange obsidian and a Staff of Moonlight, you can make your portal to the Afterlight.
